text.div:
CARIN RTPBC Example Provider ID Code System

This is a placeholder code system illustrating values from the proprietary National Council for Prescription Drug Programs (NCPDP) Provider ID identifier system. It will be replaced prior to publishing with a formal mechanism for referencing in FHIR.

This code system http://ncpdp.org/provider-id defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
0999017 Hometown Drug
0999029 My Mail Service Pharmacy
0999031 Acme Specialty Pharmacy
0999043 Local LTC Pharmacy

name: CarinRtpbcExampleProviderIdCodeSystem
title: CARIN RTPBC Example Provider ID Code System
